title: Add extra File IO operations to bytes.Buffer module
body:
I originally implemented a StringIO module which mimics a File but after
communicated with Rob via the group channel, we agreed that it would be
good to extend bytes.Buffer functionality directly to support File
operations. The detail is here:

https://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts/browse_thread/thread/1eaded9352517dbd

In the future, bytes.Buffer can also be used just like StringIO in other
languages to mimic a File.
